name: Imperial Academy Training
Lore: 'Graduates of the Empire''s military academies train to fire standardissue weapons efficiently.',
Text: 'Deploy on your side of table. Each of your non-unique Imperials armed with a non-unique blaster is forfeit +2, adds 1 to his total weapon destiny and, where present, cumulatively adds 1 to total battle destiny. (Immune to Alter while your non-unique blaster is on table.)',
